title: Japan - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: Embassy Fee: FREE (for BD passport holders) + VFS: BDT 1,900 + Chologhuri: BDT 3,000
processing_time: Embassy: 10–12 working days (after submission), Chologhuri: 3–5 working days
validity: As per embassy decision (typically short-term single-entry)

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi passport holders with valid reason for tourism and supporting financial and identity documents.
Must obtain appointment confirmation from VFS Global prior to visa submission.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Cover Letter & Travel Itinerary (Prepared by Chologhuri)
Flight Reservation & Hotel Booking (Prepared by Chologhuri)
Two recent passport-size photos (2” × 1.4”, white background)
Additional documents based on occupation (job, business, student, etc.)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
